metadata.title: Application Test Automation: 98% Test Coverage for Critical Security Platform Modernization
metadata.overview: A client successfully modernized their critical security platform through comprehensive UI/UX enhancements and automated testing implementation. The solution delivered 98% test coverage across 1,800+ scenarios using Cypress test automation framework, Angular Material integration, and efficient build infrastructure for reliable security platform operations.

email.subject: Test Automation Success: 98% Coverage for Critical Security Platform Modernization
email.body:
When a client needed assistance with User Interface enhancements and modernization for their critical security platform, they faced the complex challenge of rewriting application features, modifying UI/UX designs, and implementing comprehensive automated testing for developed features.

Their existing platform lacked modern UI components, efficient build processes, and comprehensive test coverage needed for reliable security operations.

**Our Application Development team delivered comprehensive modernization:**

• **98% test coverage** across almost 1,800 scenarios including edge cases and bug testing
• **Comprehensive test automation framework** utilizing Cypress with Cucumber reports and modular test steps
• **Repository infrastructure** for more efficient builds and deployments with reusable components
• **Site-wide framework and global components** including authentication and Material Design integration
• **Angular Material library implementation** with modern UI/UX design and themes
• **Legacy platform integration** enabling test automation framework utilization for production systems

**The technical foundation:** We built reusable objects for Dashboards and Activities, implemented initial authentication and login functionality, and created refactored test steps for higher modularity and reusability with automated data cleanup.

**The business impact:** The client now has a modern, reliable security platform with comprehensive test coverage, efficient development processes, and the ability to maintain high-quality standards across all application features.
